mapper.select: SELECT user.id , user.deleted , user.created_at as createdAt , user.modified_at as modifiedAt , user.username , user.name , user.phone FROM user WHERE user.id = #{id}

SELECT user.id FROM user WHERE user.id is not NULL AND user.deleted = #{deleted} AND user.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= user.created_at AND user.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND user.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone})

SELECT user.id FROM user WHERE user.id is not NULL AND user.deleted = #{deleted} AND user.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= user.created_at AND user.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND user.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}) ORDER BY user.created_at ORDER BY user.title DESC ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{perpage}

SELECT count(user.id) as listsize FROM user WHERE user.id is not NULL AND user.deleted = #{deleted} AND user.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= user.created_at AND user.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND user.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone})

SELECT user.id FROM user WHERE user.id is not NULL AND user.deleted = #{deleted} AND user.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= user.created_at AND user.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND user.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone})
AND #{createdAt} > user.created_at ORDER BY user.created_at DESC
AND user.created_at > #{createdAt} ORDER BY user.created_at ASC
LIMIT 0, #{perpage}
